title: That sinking feeling: It’s been a long year for the Giants
description: A year ago at the All-Star break, the Giants had the best record in MLB. Now they own the second-worst record in baseball. Here's a breakdown looking just how far the team has fallen.
seo_title: By-the-numbers: How S.F. Giants fell so far behind at the All-Star break
author: Mike Massa
twitter_text: That sinking feeling: It’s been a long year for the Giants
